sentences.en: "The Turtle" is a common breakdance move involving the work of your feet.
sentences.cn: “乌龟”是一种常见的霹雳舞，涉及移动你的脚的工作。

sentences.en: Learn how to sing and breakdance.
Learning how to breakdance involves a certain amount of preparation.
sentences.cn: 学习如何跳霹雳舞涉及一定数额的准备。

sentences.en: You dance well. Do you breakdance?
sentences.cn: 你的舞跳得真好，你跳霹雳舞吗？
